name: The Price of Redemption (Demo)
description:
Welcome back Subject Number 0142

I thank you for partaking in another one of my experiments, and I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed my last one. This test, however, I should warn you, there are higher stakes going into this.

For this experiment, you will be thrown into a simulation. This simulation is a re-creation of another test subject's memories, 7747's to be precise. While his memories are re-created here, the choices he made were not. You will have full control over what happens.

Your job here is the same as last time. Complete the simulation, and you will be rewarded. Fail, and your life is forfeit. I know after last time this may seem like a lot at stake, but let me reassure you, the data that you collect will be astronomical to assisting what I have planned for the future.

Are you ready to begin?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developers note: This is just a demo for now. Once the full game is ready to be released, this demo will be removed from the market.
